My name is Ben and I use computers to solve problems in biology. I am a second-year graduate student in the laboratory of Claus Wilke at the University of Texas at Austin. Before coming to UT, I earned my BS in Biochemistry from the University of Miami and then spent two years at American Red Cross working in an HLA/Molecular Genetics laboratory.
